transcript.p: RANAWAYfrom the subscriber, on the 9th inst. about five miles below Law- enceburg, from a boat on the passage up from Orleans, a negro boy named DAVID, about 16 or 17 years old, 5 feet 5 or 6 inches high, and very active; just above the right breast are two lumps or scars, supposed to be done with the whip, and two similar scars on the back of the neck, and two scars on the left breast, one very plain, the other not quite so plain. When he laughs, his eye-teeth project almost out of his mouth. He has a large flat nose, and very impudent look. The hair on his head is very thin, so that the skin is seen in streaks thro' the hair. He speaks English, and in- different French. The above rewars and reasonable charges will be given to any person apprehending and delivering him to the subscriber, or confining him in any way so that he may be had again.
